name: Coding Clicker
description:
Coding Clicker, a clicker game where you try to make as much money as possible by coding.  You can buy generators, upgrades, and employees to help you make more money.  

This game is still in development, so expect some bugs.   We are still working on it and will make it more polished and release more content later.  Currently, it would probably be better to wait until 0.1.1 as 0.1.0 still has some big bugs.

Good luck!!!

Website:  codingclicker.com  (Website still being worked on)

Version: Alpha 0.1.0
